name: Minetime (Smelly Rose Entertainment)
description:
Early Access

Minetime is a Game where you Mine blocks and run from Lava!

You can mine Stone, Coal, Redstone, Iron, Gold, Lapis, Diamond, Emeralds, Yellowstone, Ruby or Inverted Ruby.

There are also Obstacles like the Lava that follows you or the Bedrock that blocks your way!

NOT AN OFFICIAL MINECRAFT PRODUCT. NOT APPROVED BY OR ASSOCIATED WITH MOJANG.
